attributes.action: provide all trainee teachers with free paper copies of the National Curriculum and all other relevant publications.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of a Government drive to cut costs, trainee teachers are no longer provided with paper copies of the NC. The only way to access this now is via the internet which is inconviniant and not practical.The National Curriculum is a basic document needed to be able to teach effectivley in school to the standard which OFSTED expect.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Department for Children, Schools and Families.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
